Films and TV programmes are often made out of continuity.

sentences.english: In the second act of the play the plot thickens.

sentences.english: The third part of "The Cartoon of Kids of Family" is almost the same as the real-life version.

sentences.english: Or I might continue munching popcorn right through my tears.
sentences.chinese: 或者我會一邊爲劇情傷心流淚，一邊卻在喫爆米花。

sentences.english: These  fragmented ads spoil the fun and disturb the plot flow.
sentences.chinese: 這些插片廣告極大地破壞了劇情的連貫性和趣味性。

sentences.english: I walked out because the plot was just warmed-over Bambi…
sentences.chinese: 我看不下去是因爲劇情，跟《小鹿斑比》太像了。

sentences.english: A. The new single player campaign is a meta-game centered entirely around player choice.
sentences.chinese: 新的單人遊蟹戰役完全基於玩家選擇而發展劇情。

sentences.english: Love is when she grips your arm during the scary bits of the movie.
sentences.chinese: 愛是當她看到驚恐的劇情時不自禁地抓着你的手。

sentences.english: The unusually strong story is partially based on the true life of Wong Fei Hung.
sentences.chinese: 由於黃飛鴻的一生世人知之甚少，所以劇情多有虛構。

sentences.english: Her acting is good, both her role and the plot are necessary.
sentences.chinese: 湯唯的表演出色，她的角色和情節對劇情都是必要的。

sentences.english: The foil brilliant-colored brocade effectively, apply colours to a drawing of the plot.

sentences.english: Erek Paxton: The scenario begins 350 years into the Age of Ice.
sentences.chinese: 這個劇情開始於350年進入的冰河世紀。

sentences.english: It was a discussion they had back in season three and sat on it.
sentences.chinese: 在第三季的時候，主創人員就有討論過這樣的劇情。

sentences.english: It was high drama in the courtroom from the start.
sentences.chinese: 從一開始，法庭就上演了高潮起伏的劇情。

sentences.english: Eragon is his first feature film.
sentences.chinese: 《龍騎士》是他執導的第一部劇情片。
